description: The ambassador defends his country's response after remarks by Sweden's state epidemiologist.
title: Coronavirus: Italy envoy rejects remark by Sweden's chief epidemiologist
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy envoy rejects remark by Sweden's chief epidemiologist - BBC News
maintext: "It didn't need to be as it appeared in China, and perhaps even Italy, where they have fewer resources for this," he said. "We as a society should be able to manage this better."
